body: The only one I'd want to double-check is the HPACK bomb (haven't read the details yet). But https://github.com/golang/net/commit/6050c111928ef9186beb82e4395437607bb24bdb and https://github.com/golang/net/commit/21c3935a8fc0f954d03e6b8a560c9600ffee38d2 and https://github.com/golang/net/commit/59e870b2963d78af46909371603f8c4de3debcc2 and https://github.com/golang/net/commit/d8f3c68ddd4bb686ca3bd70e49bbc64b80c78144 and https://github.com/golang/net/commit/29704b8f8f57fa48a0d8237fc20ed7c6744b86b1 seem to cover it.
